channel.title: Dithered By Jim Cavill and Graham Juneau
channel.description: Two teenage guys from Nowhere, Ontario, Canada take you on a journey into the ever-changing Hardcore/Indy Scene. Featuring new songs from great artists, this podcast is sure to get your toes tapping.
channel.itunes:subtitle: KEMPTVILLE ONTARIO'S BEST PODCAST... and probably the only one.
channel.itunes:author: Jim and Graham Cavill and Juneau (respectively)
channel.itunes:summary: Two teenage guys from Nowhere, Ontario, Canada take you on a journey into the ever-changing Hardcore/Indy Scene. Featuring new songs from great artists, this podcast is sure to get your toes tapping.
